title: Ticket #1127: Use Globus 5.0 libraries in Condor
description:
Globus 5.0.0 has been released and we should be using it in Condor. It includes bug-fixes in GSI and an expanded GRAM API.

As part of this update, we need to check if the Globus source files that the gt2 and nordugrid gahps use modified versions of have changed.
remarks: Pushed a change to master for Condor 7.5.1.
check_ins: 2010-Jan-25 10:47   Check-in [16959]: Change Globus external to 5.0.0. #1127 This includes bumping version strings for gt2 and nordugrid gahps, fixing a changed library name, updating the modified gridftp source files used by the nordugrid gahp, and adding some patches for building on Solaris and AIX. (By Jaime Frey )
creator: jfrey
